name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_updateTemplateQuestionsFromReference
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!templateQuestions: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestion_Template(
    questionReferenceId: ri!referenceQuestion[recordType!AS GCM QNM R Question.questionReferenceId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!referenceQuestion[recordType!AS GCM QNM R Question.questionReferenceId]),
    fields: {
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.createdBy,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.createdDatetime,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId
    }
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    data: local!templateQuestions,
    index: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.label,
    value: ri!referenceQuestion[recordType!AS GCM QNM R Question.defaultLabel]
  )
)
